documents.document: @crystaln2209 she's adorable. Really nice photo too.
Dentist appoint today. I don't like getting dental work, but it was "interesting" with quakes. Stopped twice to wait for shaking to stop.
Just watched season 1 of Cleverman. Great show! Looking forward to next season. https://t.co/Q7qsHUVPCx
How Tae Dae The Scottish... https://t.co/dwpfZ7P2KT via @YouTube
@Rossy167 @JimSterling the penalty for breaching the UK gambling act is maximum 51weeks in prison, a fine or both for each offence.

Saw @kubothemovie with niece and husband over the weekend, we all loved it. I love the miniatures and stop-motion. #KuboAndTheTwoStrings

I loved "Warcraft: the Beginning". Looking forward to the next movie.

@Harlack thanks for sharing your thoughts on fair use on YouTube. You make a really great point. I hadn't thought of it that way. Thanks.

We saw Star Wars: TFA at Lighthouse Cinema, Cuba earlier today (xmas eve). Only 5 other ppl in cinema, it was great! Really enjoyed movie!
They're Esports. Like how driving around a track is MOTORsports. It's competitive & requires skill. https://t.co/7o2yySDFvU
This review made me more excited about Krampus. I'm still trying to convince my husband to watch it with me. https://t.co/IJPOMxQ5L8
Joined the @redlettermedia message boards a few hours ago. It's now 4.30am and I know I should sleep but this fan art thread is amazing!!
@BlackCapsNo1Fan sorry you've had a sad day. *hugs* hope you feel better in the morning!
@BlackCapsNo1Fan i agree, that would be nice. I hear from friends less since I deleted my facebook.

The final of #FindMeAMāoriBride was brilliant! If you haven't seen it, you should definitely check it out @maoritv http://t.co/fEY8oNhANZ
@Steejo. Really enjoying your current series. Loved your Michelle Bell Project Zomboid. Will you be doing another Project Zomboid lets play?
Really enjoying #FindMeAMaoriBride on @maoritv. Great show with a great cast and crew! http://t.co/fEY8oNhANZ
I just backed We Happy Few - Welcome to Wellington Wells, you Saucy Minx on @Kickstarter http://t.co/W3BFOLxjsg
The game probably isn't for me but I love the trailer! Makes me want to play it. https://t.co/1iZ5GaCSpI
I'm a Real Platinum God!! #bindingofisaacrebirth
Perfect view of moon while still being able to watch youtube videos on tv and play Isaac (Rebirth) on laptop. Moon is partially eclipsed.

10 Photos of People Taken RIGHT Before They DIED! Part of new segment for Seriously Strange by @TheRobDyke http://t.co/NygAxErAF3
Apparently, it's St Patrick's Day... that explains the raging party next door that I can hear through our apartment wall.
@TheRobDyke My husband read the comic book series of it and he didn't like it at all. Gonna give the show a watch but expectations are low.
@catelecast, I think I was too young when I saw Donnie Darko & didn't get it. Your podcast has made me want to give it another watch.Thanks!
@crystaln2209 that's cool. Don't worry, we haven't told (& wont tell) anyone. Don't really talk to many ppl.
.@crystaln2209. Doing some research and found this old photo... that's Uncle Kelvin, right?! http://t.co/ayGXniC4OI

@crystaln2209 that's cool. you catching a ride? Your welcome to stay here if you need to btw.
@crystaln2209 text me details of your flights when you get them, k.
First paragraph is brilliant,the rest deserves a read too "Playing video games linked to breast-feeding,not crime http://t.co/9ioXJdAoTk"

Minister used wrong figures to justify gang policy, police admit http://t.co/91hjFCXuQa via @nzherald
@crystaln2209 that sounds awesome! thanks! I don't think I have any books you'd be interested in reading.
@MrTunupopo haha. I'm good. Feeling kinda sick right now tho,ate lots of dessert at chocolate buffet for dinner. Sugar overload! How're you?
Going to the Chocolate Buffet at Amora later today with friends. Super excited! So much chocolate! #Wellington
In movies, when ppl only hear part of a full conversation their perspective is skewed. This can be the same for reading cropped screencaps.
@BlackCapsNo1Fan yes, but advanced voting started a few days ago. We did it early because we won't make it to booths on 20th.
Voted! Don't forget to vote if you haven't already. #Election2014 #nzpol
@bigmfraser amazing video! Thanks for sharing!
The gaming community is not a wretched hive of sexism and misogyny. http://t.co/15KHPe2oqT via @examinercom

@crystaln2209 that'd be awesome. I'll let you know if I end up buying any before then. I have other books I should finish reading.
@crystaln2209 I'll try find Paper Towns next. We have an awesome bookstore here which has a lot of his books for like $18.
@crystaln2209 awesome. I thought he might be who you suggested ages ago. I've been watching his youtube videos and realised he writes books
@crystaln2209 what books (if any) have you read by John Green? Read 'A Fault in Our Stars', loved it. Wanted to read before seeing film.
@crystaln2209 cool cool.
I love Peter Capaldi as The Doctor. Watched Doctor Who - Deep Breath (and extras) at Lighthouse Theatre this arvo, it was brilliant.

5 of 5 stars to In Pale Battalions by Robert Goddard http://t.co/HFKHlXJM0S
Wow, I'm on that diet too! It's the best. "@Dommoschitti: I'm on this new diet where I eat whatever I want and you can go fuck yourself."
@MLukeBrown awesome, thanks.
@MLukeBrown, is that 10pm EDT?
Watching @Dommoschitti on Friend Zone. Is that Old Snickerdoodles I hear? http://t.co/gz4JJzGN6C

@hughlaurie when I worked in a hotel, several front desk people/porters played sudoku when there was nothing else to do. They're really good
@crystaln2209 Yay! I've pretty much stopped using Facebook (trouble loading site & mobile app sucks on my tablet so I gave up)
Because I haven't drawn in such a long time, I'm super rusty... Going to have a re-learn a few things. Practice makes perfect. Sleep now tho
@HeyNickMurphy I like "scarily handsome". I'm going to call my husband that when he gets home from work and see how he reacts.
Watched @ContinueShow BMX XXX (PS2) ep., I learnt a game dev tip (if your game is bad, add titties) & laughed a lot. http://t.co/FrY6PJ4ifq
@SyndicationPod Awesome! We don't get Netflix in NZ but we have other similar things.
Sad I can't grow a gnarly wizard beard. I look awesome with a moustache. Although, I've only had fake ones... Plan B: buy fake wizard beard.
@SyndicationPod I think it'd be awesome if you guys did Sliders and/or Quantum Leap. Don't know how accessible they are though
Photo of my first attempt at a plush toy. Hand sewn. It's a squid! Not perfect but close enough for a first time. http://t.co/JQ1MQ92XyZ
It's late on a Sunday night and I'm attempting my first soft toy project... A squid for my husband.
@Dommoschitti of boobs?
Listened to first episode of @SyndicationPod. Fantastic podcast! This episode they talked about the X-files pilot http://t.co/IhUxdlqIud
These look amazing! "Red Bull Superheroes by Diego Fonseca http://t.co/D4M7jRRuzt via @YouTheDesigner"
@SyndicationPod , I'm so excited that you're talking about X-files for the first episode! It was one of my favourite shows as a kid.
Worst part about NZ summer, the sun feels like it's melting my face off.
@Henderson1983 I'm jealous you've had snow. I would happily swap weather with you if I had that sort of magical powers.
<3 @ZanePants story from episode 24 & @PaulRitchey story from episode 14 of @FantasyFicPod . Would <3 to hear more stories from them.
Happy valentines day! This is what my husband got me. He's wonderful. I <3 Watchman graphic novel and white roses. http://t.co/gScIdbQ4u7
Started listening to Fantasy Fiction podcast ( @FantasyFicPod ). Thoroughly recommend. It makes me laugh so much. I love it!

Finished reading "Is It Just Me?" by @mermhart. Funny and inspiring. She's amazing and so is her book. <3

Just finished watching the 50th anniversary episode of Dr Who and I loved it. I now want to do a Dr Who marathon in the near future.
